relevant_findings.HEENT: PERRL, EOMI, no icterus or injection
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmur
relevant_findings.lungs: No increased work of breathing, clear to auscultation bilaterally
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mildly distended, normal bowel sounds, mild tenderness in left lower quadrant, no guarding or rebound tenderness
relevant_findings.back: surgical site clean, dry, intact, tender
relevant_findings.extremities: no edema, feet warm, palpable dorsalis pedis pulses bilaterally
relevant_findings.neurological: Normal mental status, cranial nerves intact, neck range of motion normal
